shortdesc.ph: 结构体，用于配置视频截图上传的频率。

plentry.pd: 功能模块的类型。 See for details.

pd.p:
功能模块的类型：
(0): (Default) This module has no actual function. Do not set to this value.
(1): Video content moderation. SDK takes screenshots, inspects video content of the video stream in the channel, and uploads the screenshots and moderation results.
(2): Screenshot capture. SDK takes screenshots of the video stream in the channel and uploads them.

pd.ph: The frequency (in seconds) of video content moderation. The value should be set as larger than 0. 默认值为 0，表示不进行截图上传。
The frequency (in seconds) of video content moderation. The value should be set as larger than 0. If set as 0 (default), the video content is not inspected.
Agora recommends that you set the value as 10; you can also adjust it according to your business needs.
